description: Lists the available transformers. A transformer can take an EDI file as input and transform it into a JSON-or XML-formatted document. Alternatively, a transformer can take a JSON-or XML-formatted document as input and transform it into an EDI file.

nested_items.name: transformers
nested_items.description: Returns an array of one or more transformer objects.

nested_items.name: transformerId
nested_items.description: Returns the system-assigned unique identifier for the transformer.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: Returns the descriptive name for the transformer.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Returns the state of the newly created transformer. The transformer can be either active or inactive. For the transformer to be used in a capability, its status must active.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: Returns a timestamp indicating when the transformer was created. For example, 2023-07-20T19:58:44.624Z.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: Returns a timestamp representing the date and time for the most recent change for the transformer object.

nested_items.name: fileFormat
nested_items.description: Returns that the currently supported file formats for EDI transformations are JSON and XML.

nested_items.name: mappingTemplate
nested_items.description: Returns the mapping template for the transformer. This template is used to map the parsed EDI file using JSONata or XSLT.

nested_items.name: x12Details
nested_items.description: Returns the details for the EDI standard that is being used for the transformer. Currently, only X12 is supported. X12 is a set of standards and corresponding messages that define specific business documents.

nested_items.name: transactionSet
nested_items.description: Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

nested_items.name: sampleDocument
nested_items.description: Returns a sample EDI document that is used by a transformer as a guide for processing the EDI data.

nested_items.name: inputConversion
nested_items.description: Returns a structure that contains the format options for the transformation.

nested_items.name: fromFormat
nested_items.description: The format for the transformer input: currently on X12 is supported.

nested_items.name: formatOptions
nested_items.description: A structure that contains the formatting options for an inbound transformer.

nested_items.name: transactionSet
nested_items.description: Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

nested_items.name: templateLanguage
nested_items.description: The transformation language for the template, either XSLT or JSONATA.

nested_items.name: template
nested_items.description: A string that represents the mapping template, in the transformation language specified in templateLanguage.

nested_items.name: outputConversion
nested_items.description: Returns the OutputConversion object, which contains the format options for the outbound transformation.

nested_items.name: toFormat
nested_items.description: The format for the output from an outbound transformer: only X12 is currently supported.

nested_items.name: formatOptions
nested_items.description: A structure that contains the X12 transaction set and version for the transformer output.

nested_items.name: transactionSet
nested_items.description: Returns an enumerated type where each value identifies an X12 transaction set. Transaction sets are maintained by the X12 Accredited Standards Committee.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: Returns the version to use for the specified X12 transaction set.

nested_items.name: sampleDocuments
nested_items.description: Returns a structure that contains the Amazon S3 bucket and an array of the corresponding keys used to identify the location for your sample documents.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: Contains the Amazon S3 bucket that is used to hold your sample documents.

nested_items.name: keys
nested_items.description: Contains an array of the Amazon S3 keys used to identify the location for your sample documents.

nested_items.name: input
nested_items.description: An array of keys for your input sample documents.

nested_items.name: output
nested_items.description: An array of keys for your output sample documents.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When additional results are obtained from the command, a NextToken parameter is returned in the output. You can then pass the NextToken parameter in a subsequent command to continue listing additional resources.
